mapper.select: select * from border_mst order by border_code desc;
select border_code, border_title from border_mst where border_code = ( select max(border_code) from border_mst where border_code < #{border_code} );
select border_code, border_title from border_mst where border_code = ( select min(border_code) from border_mst where border_code > #{border_code} );
mapper.insert: insert into border_mst values( 0, #{border_title}, #{border_content}, #{border_file}, #{border_tempfile}, #{writer_name}, #{writer_ip}, now(), 0, now(), now() );
